Text: FW Draft Coop City Term Sheet Cc as though this did not go through the first time My apologies for the delay Lisa G Henneberry Squire Sanders Dempsey LLP Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington DC Tel Fax wwwssdcom Original Message From Henneberry Lisa G Sent Sunday January PM To Cc White Robert I Ragals Jr William C Levey Kevin S Subject Draft Coop City Term Sheet Further to our discussions last week attached is a preliminary draft of the term sheets for the development of the Coop City project including indicative terms for EPC OM and Asset Management Since we havent yet discussed the terms in any significant detail the attached remains somewhat general with respect to some items and includes significant assumptions with respect to other Nonetheless it is a starting point for our discussions next week As discussed last week for the sake of expediency this draft is being distributed simultaneously to all parties and has not been separately reviewed by my clients It therefore remains subject to internal review and comment Next weeks meeting has been scheduled at our offices in New York beginning on Wednesday January at pm until Thursday afternoon Our offices are located at Squire Sanders Dempsey LLP Park Avenue th floor New York NY Tel Fax We look forward to seeing you then In the meantime should you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me Best regards CoOpCityTermSheetdoc Lisa G Henneberry Squire Sanders Dempsey LLP Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington DC Tel Fax wwwssdcom CoOpCityTermSheetdoc
